row.entry: The velvia module does enhance the saturation in the image, it increases saturation on lower saturated pixeks more than high satured pixels.

sect4.title: Saturation
sect4.para: This slider controls the strength of saturation for the effect.

sect4.title: Vibrance
sect4.para: Vibrance controls how much of the saturation is applied to weighted pixels.

sect4.title: Mid-tones bias
sect4.para: This slider controls preservation of saturation in mid-tones.
